description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The orcs invade your kingdom. Send troops to push them back! Play the campaign with his 50 area, or play against your friends. Up to 4 players on the same screen.
